senses.sense_definition: An instrument for indicating and recording shocks to railway cars caused by sudden stopping.

examples.text: The engineers attached a <w>slidometer</w> to the carriage to test the braking system.
Data from the <w>slidometer</w> revealed significant impact forces during the coupling process.

senses.sense_definition: A device for measuring the movement of a glacier.

examples.text: Researchers installed a <w>slidometer</w> at the base of the glacier to monitor its speed.
The <w>slidometer</w> provided precise readings of the ice sheet's daily displacement.
